title: System Health Verification
brief: Verify PRISM MCP server health: build, tests, dispatcher count, engine count, registry counts, skills/scripts/hooks inventory.

title: Data Consolidation & Deduplication
brief: Merge 1,775 files (216MB) from extracted/ and extracted_modules/ into data/registries/. Triage: port useful data, archive rest, eliminate duplicates.

title: Create 12 Core Databases
brief: Create 12 new databases: WorkholdingDB, InsertDB, ThreadDB, GradeDB, SurfaceFinishDB, ToleranceDB, ControllerDB, PostProcessorDB, CuttingFluidDB, FeatureDB + 2 consolidated DBs.

title: Create 12 PASS2 Specialty Databases
brief: Create 12 specialty databases from PASS2: FRF, BearingFit, SpindleConfig, ChipBreaker, ToolHolder, CoolantNozzle, HSK/BT30, NanoCoating, CuttingForce, RoughnessProfile, ThermalDeformation, VibrationSignature.

title: Registry Enrichment â€” Full Coverage
brief: Enrich ALL 18,516 registry entries: MaterialRegistry (kc1.1/mc, J-C, Taylor, thermal), ToolRegistry (geometry), MachineRegistry (spindle curves), AlarmRegistry (troubleshooting trees).

title: Registry Infrastructure + Cross-Registry Index + DSL
brief: Fix 6 critical DSL gaps: file-based formula/algorithm loading, MiniSearch FTS indexing, DecisionTreeEngine registration, expand CompoundActions to 10, InferenceChains to 5, AlgorithmGateway to full registry.

title: Port ALL 14 Monolith Algorithms
brief: Port 14 algorithms from monolith JS to TypeScript: 8 core (Kienzle, Taylor, Johnson-Cook, SurfaceFinish, StabilityLobe, ChipThinning, ThermalPartition, PowerTorque) + 6 extended (ChipFormation, ToolWear, CostOptimizer, ThreadForce, Deflection, MRR).

title: 18 New General-Purpose Algorithms
brief: Implement 18 new algorithms: Genetic, SimAnnealing, PSO, Neural, Bayesian, MonteCarlo, Fuzzy, DigitalTwin, TimeSeries, AnomalyDetect, Clustering, DecisionTree, Regression, Interpolation, Kalman, PID, FEA2D, FFT.

title: 14 New Manufacturing-Specific Algorithms (PASS2)
brief: Implement 14 PASS2 manufacturing algorithms: MinkowskiSum, SweptVolume, ChipVolume, JaegerTemp, UsuiWear, FRFStability, RCSA, CWEZBuffer, AntColony, DPMultiPass, ILP, CSP, STFTChatter, WaveletBreakage. 8 are SAFETY-CRITICAL.

title: Algorithm Engine & Wiring
brief: Wire all 46 algorithms into AlgorithmEngine: AlgorithmRegistry registration, AlgorithmGateway routing, benchmark suite, cross-validation against prism_calc.

title: Port 8 Monolith Engines
brief: Port 8 monolith engines: CADKernel, CAMKernel, Simulation, Visualization, AIML, FileIO, Report, Settings.

title: 20 Manufacturing Intelligence Engines
brief: Create 20 manufacturing intelligence engines: ToolSelection, MaterialSelection, MachineSelection, FixtureDesign, ProcessPlan, CostEstimation, Quote, Scheduling, QualityPrediction, Troubleshooting, TribalKnowledge, LearningPath, DigitalTwin, PredictiveMaint, EnergyOpt, BatchOpt, Nesting, ProbeRoutine, SetupSheet, ToolCrib.

title: 16 CAD/CAM Engines
brief: Create 16 CAD/CAM engines including geometry, toolpath, collision, surface analysis. 4 safety engines with blocking hooks.

title: 16 Infrastructure Engines
brief: Create 16 infrastructure engines: Auth, Tenant, Plugin, Backup, Migration, Audit, Notification, Cache, Search, Queue, Rate, Monitor, Health, Config, License, Telemetry.

title: 44 PASS2 Specialty Engines
brief: Create 44 PASS2 specialty engines across manufacturing domains: turning, grinding, EDM, threading, 5-axis, and more. 9 safety-critical engines.

title: 6 Core New Dispatchers
brief: Create 6 new dispatchers: prism_cad (10 actions), prism_cam (9), prism_quality (8), prism_scheduling (8), prism_auth (8), prism_export (8). Plus extend prism_intelligence (+4) and prism_data (+8).

title: 6 PASS2 Specialty Dispatchers
brief: Create 6 PASS2 specialty dispatchers: prism_turning, prism_5axis, prism_edm, prism_grinding, prism_additive, prism_composite.

title: 20 Core Hooks + 6 Cadences
brief: Create 20 core hooks (5 blocking safety + 4 warning quality + 4 business + 4 system + 3 API) and 6 time-based cadences (daily, weekly, hourly, shift, monthly, quarterly).

title: 20 PASS2 Specialty Hooks + 6 Cadences
brief: Create 20 PASS2 specialty hooks (6 blocking + 14 warning across manufacturing domains) and 6 specialty cadences.

title: 22 Core Product/Feature Skills
brief: Create 22 core skills: 4 product quick-starts (SFC, PPG, Learning, ERP), 18 feature guides (CAD import, CAM toolpath, digital twin, scheduling, quality, cost, maintenance, troubleshooting, etc.).

title: 22 PASS2 Specialty Skills
brief: Create 22 PASS2 specialty skills for aerospace, automotive, medical, energy, and other industry verticals.

title: 14 Core + 14 PASS2 Scripts
brief: Create 28 automation scripts: 14 core (material-lookup, tool-recommend, safety-check, cost-estimate, etc.) + 14 PASS2 (aerospace-check, medical-validate, etc.).

title: Core REST API Routes
brief: Create core REST API: SFC 11 endpoints, PPG 8 endpoints, Learning 6 endpoints, ERP 8 endpoints. Express.js routes with validation middleware, response formatting, OpenAPI specs.

title: Auth, Admin, WebSocket & OpenAPI
brief: Auth middleware (JWT), admin endpoints, WebSocket real-time updates, consolidated OpenAPI spec, rate limiting, CORS.

title: SFC Calculator Core UI
brief: Build SFC Calculator page: 7 sub-calculators (Speed/Feed, Force, Power, Surface, Stability, Cost, Tool Life), shared input/results panels, safety badge, unit toggle.

title: SFC Smart Selectors
brief: Add material/tool/machine smart search selectors with autocomplete, filters, recent history, and favorites.

title: SFC Advanced Features
brief: Add what-if analysis, parameter comparison, formula browser (KaTeX), data export (PDF/CSV), presets, batch calculation.

title: SFC Testing, Polish & Ship
brief: Full SFC release: E2E tests, performance optimization, accessibility, documentation, deployment. Ralph loop + Omega validation.

title: PPG Engine + API
brief: Post Processor Generator backend: G-code translation engine for 6+ controllers (Fanuc, Siemens, Haas, Mazak, Okuma, Heidenhain), validation, syntax highlighting.

title: PPG Web UI
brief: PPG web interface: Monaco editor for G-code, dual-pane translator, controller selector, syntax validation, diff view, export.

title: CAD/CAM Learning Engine + API
brief: Learning platform backend: lesson engine, progress tracking, formula explanations, troubleshooting wizard, knowledge assessment.

title: CAD/CAM Learning Web UI
brief: Learning web interface: interactive lessons with KaTeX formulas, progress dashboard, quiz system, troubleshooting wizard, 3D visualization.

title: ERP/Business Engine + API
brief: ERP backend: job management, quoting, scheduling, cost tracking, inventory, work orders, purchase orders.

title: ERP/Business Web UI
brief: ERP web interface: job dashboard, quote generator, Gantt scheduler, cost tracker, inventory management, reports.

title: PASS2 Additional Pages
brief: 3 additional product pages: Digital Work Instructions, Shift Dashboard, Material Cert Viewer.
